CustomField.description: If set to “Yes” then when the user selects “United States” and “Ohio” then we store [State].[IsoCode] “OH” in the State field. If value is “No” then we store the [State].[Name] – “Ohio”
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled the State field is completed with the state ISO Code value. Otherwise the state Name value is used.
CustomField.label: Use Subcountry Code in State field
